title: The Perfect Specimen (1937 - USA) [Errol Flynn] comedy
description:
The Perfect Specimen (1937 - USA)

Comedy

director . . . . Michael Curtiz
starring . . . . Errol Flynn, Joan Blondell, Hugh Herbert
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0029391/


Errol Flynn plays a sheltered young rich man who is introduced to the wider world by Joan Blondell in this film, his first light comedy. In one scene he did some boxing, which led studio publicists to invent the fantasy that he had represented Australia as a boxer in the 1928 Olympics.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 640x480, 25.000 fps, 1500 kbps, 01h36m43s
Audio: AAC, 44100 Hz, stereo, 127 kbps

TVRip, TCM watermark, English audio, no subtitles
